hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repoPath
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set the repository address on GitHub. Format: <USERNAME/REPOSITORY>.

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: fileName
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description: Select configuration file in yml or yaml format.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: localHostList
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Set the host list. Each host on a new line in the format <USERNAME@HOSTNAME:PORT>. ⚠️ To use the parameter, select the network: "local-host-list".

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: target
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description: Select target (alias for a group of commands) to execution. ⚠️ Use "null" to execution the selected command.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: envVars
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Change variable values in the format <KEY=VALUE> (each variable on a new line).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: credentials
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID SSH Username with private key from Jenkins Credentials for ssh connection.
